tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to migration using cross-platform transportable tablespaces with RMAN incremental backupus and M5 script.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Check and prepare source database
tutorials.description: Ensure the source database meets the requirements and make necessary preparations

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create target database
tutorials.description: Create a new PDB and ensure it meets the requirements and make necessary preparations

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Prepare M5 script
tutorials.description: Extract, examine and configure the M5 script.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Initial backup/restore
tutorials.description: Start the migration by performing an initial level 0 backup/restore.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Incremental backup/restore
tutorials.description: Perform incremental backup/restore cycles to minimize downtime.

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Post-migration tasks
tutorials.description: Things to check and perform after migration.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
